verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I’ve found a refuge from life’s care in Jesus, I am hiding in His love divine; He fully understands my soul’s deep longing, And He whispers softly, “Thou art mine.”

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Only Jesus! Only Jesus! Only He can satisfy; Ev'ry burden becomes a blessing, When I know my Lord is nigh.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I’ve found a precious joy in knowing Jesus, Never dreamed of in this world of woe; No clouds, however dark, can dim the radiance Of the heav’nly light He doth bestow.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I’ve found a blessèd hope divine in Jesus, ’Tis a Day Star ever shining bright; It fills my earthly way with heav’nly glory, And it turns life’s darkness into light.
